0.text: Students: Yes, teacher. Teacher: Alright. Drink a lot of water. It's hot these days. Dasun: Yes. Teacher: Well, best of luck with your events, children. Students: Thank you, teacher.

1.text: True or false? 1. Nisal went for sports practices. 2. Nisal is absent. 3. The students have sports practices every day. 4. The teacher said "It's rainy these says."
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>True <break time='200ms'/> or <break time='200ms'/> false? <break time='200ms'/> 1. <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='nisal'>Nisal</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> went <break time='200ms'/> for <break time='200ms'/> sports <break time='200ms'/> practices. <break time='200ms'/> 2. <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='nisal'>Nisal</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> absent. <break time='200ms'/> 3. <break time='200ms'/> The <break time='200ms'/> students <break time='200ms'/> have <break time='200ms'/> sports <break time='200ms'/> practices <break time='200ms'/> every <break time='200ms'/> day. <break time='200ms'/> 4. <break time='200ms'/> The <break time='200ms'/> teacher <break time='200ms'/> said <break time='200ms'/> "It's <break time='200ms'/> rainy <break time='200ms'/> these <break time='200ms'/> says." <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

2.text: Teacher can take the role of the teacher and assign the other roles to groups or to individual students. Familiarize the students with the greetings and wishes used in the conversation.
